#Text=Interview with Brazilian blogger Ricardo Serran Lobo
#Text=Wednesday , January 18 , 2006
#Text=Ricardo Serran
#Text=Lobo is a Brazilian blogger who writes about his famous neighbor , the politician Roberto Jefferson , head of the Brazilian Labor Party in the Brazilian Congress of Deputies .
#Text=Jefferson has become a major figure in the ongoing Brazilian mensalão scandal revolving around corruption and bribery .
#Text=Vizinho do Jefferson quickly became very popular among Brazilians , describing the routine of Jefferson , while providing information about politics and fresh news about the scandal .
#Text=Lobo 's blog got third place in the Best Of Blogs contest run by Deutsche Welle International .

#Text=Lobo gets an intimate look at the center of Brazilian politics by living in Brasilia , near residences of parliamentarians ( including Roberto Jefferson ) , public buildings and the Brazilian Chamber of Deputies .
#Text=Or , as he says in his blog : " near the eye of the hurricane , " a reference to the recent political crisis .
#Text=At first , Lobo began describing the daily activities of his famous neighbor deputy Roberto Jefferson .
#Text=As the crisis moved on , he began to describe the political events regarding it .
#Text=His writings evolved to not only what is going on with Jefferson , but what is going on in Brazilian Congress , and has interviewed politicians , including Roberto Jefferson himself .
#Text=The blog tries to be informative , with a lot of humour ( common with Brazilians ) , and some protests against the bad habits of Brazilian politics in general .
#Text=Jefferson 's neighbor , the blog , is an example of citizen journalism and it shows that ordinary people can compete with professional media .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Personal questions
#Text=Wikinews : Our interviewee is the Brazilian Ricardo Serran Lobo .
#Text=He is usually known as the Vizinho do Jefferson ( Jefferson 's neighbor ) , because of his personal weblog about politics , which became very popular during the " mensalão " crisis in Brasil .
#Text=Ricardo Lobo : Good afternoon !
#Text=My name is Ricardo , I am a publicity man and teacher of web writing , and speaker of the Information Era and Digital Communication , 44 .
#Text=Wikinews : Are you from Brasília ?
#Text=Ricardo Lobo : No.
#Text=I am from São Paulo and from Santa Catarina in my heart .
#Text=Wikinews :
#Text=How long have you been living in Brasília ?
#Text=Ricardo Lobo : I have been living for five years in Brasília .
#Text=All these years I have been a neighbor of the ex-deputy Roberto Jefferson .
#Text=The blog
#Text=Wikinews : What was your aim at starting a blog
#Text=Ricardo Lobo : The blog was born without any aim .
#Text=In fact it was a joke with a college friend of mine and my cousin .
#Text=They knew that I lived next door to the deputy [ Roberto Jefferson ] and they asked me every day about the journalists staying out in front of his door at his building .

#Text=Ricardo Lobo : So , I began to write the blog , it was closer to the " making of " a journalistic coverture , describing the confusion and the changes of routine caused by the journalists who staying under my window , waiting for something happens .
